Class ControllerNewAccount

java.lang.Object
guiNewAccount.ControllerNewAccount
public class ControllerNewAccount extends Object

Title: ControllerNewAccount Class.

Description: The Java/FX-based New Account Page. This class provides the controller actions to allow the user to establish a new account after responding to an invitation and the use of a one time code. The controller deals with the user pressing the "User Step" button widget being click. If also supports the user click on the "Quit" button widget. The class has been written assuming that the View or the Model are the only class methods that can invoke these methods. This is why each has been declared at "protected". Do not change any of these methods to public.

  • Method Details

    • doCreateUser

      protected static void doCreateUser()

      Method: public doCreateUser()

      Description: This method is called when the user has clicked on the User Setup button. This method checks the input fields to see that they are valid. If so, it then creates the account by adding information to the database. The method reaches batch to the view page and to fetch the information needed rather than passing that information as parameters.

    • performQuit

      protected static void performQuit()

      Method: public performQuit()

      Description: This method is called when the user has clicked on the Quit button. Doing this terminates the execution of the application. All important data must be stored in the database, so there is no cleanup required. (This is important so we can minimize the impact of crashed.)
